name: Spellbender
description:
Spellbender is an action adventure game built for HTC Vive, in which you will use physical motions to cast spells and unleash your magic powers on your enemies. Remember Dragonball Z? That.

You will take the role of a young wizard apprentice, and learn to harness the powers of spell crystals. However, you quickly find yourself in the middle of a necromancer's centuries-old ploy for domination, being the only pawn he did not account for. Use your newfound magic prowess to battle the undead and recover the shadow crystals!

Spellbender is currently a playable demo. News on its development will be available at http://playeronegames.nl. 

CAUTIONARY NOTE:
This game may have you flailing your arms around wildly, make sure you have plenty of room!
